title.rendered: Adam Katz, Managing Director of Recruiting

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Adam_Katz_Managing_Director_Recruiting.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” use_border_color=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off”]

Adam Katz, Managing Director of Recruiting

Adam joined ClinLab Staffing in 2009 as an Entry-Level Recruiter.  Within his first year, he became the top billing recruiter in the company.  Throughout the course of his career at Clinlab, Adam has steadily moved his way up within account management and management roles.  He’s now currently the Managing Director of Recruiting, overseeing all recruitment efforts.

Adam brings over 10 years of Sales and Recruiting experience within the Life Science Industries. He attributes his success to his strong work ethic and determination. His goal is to drive the growth of ClinLab Staffing from an east coast recruiting firm into a nationally known brand.

Adam enjoys spending his free time hiking, skiing, staying active and being around friends & family.

Massachusetts Office
T: 508.907.6222
E: info@clinlabstaffing.com

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
